name: ABSearchElement
desc: An object you use to specify a search query for records in the Address Book database.

items.name: init!(forConjunction: ABSearchConjunction, children: [Any]!)
items.desc: Returns a compound search element, created by combining the search elements in an array with the given conjunction.

items.name: func matchesRecord(ABRecord!) -> Bool
items.desc: Tests whether or not a record matches a search element.

items.name: typealias ABSearchConjunction
items.desc: Constants used to create compound search elements.

items.name: typealias ABSearchComparison
items.desc: Constants used to specify the type of comparison beingmade.
